svg.text: 4 Containers: 3 Confidential (Contoso, Fabrikam, Woodgrove Bank) + 1 Standard (Snooper)

2. MAA issues JWT token for Woodgrove container
3. Contoso & Fabrikam Key Vaults verify JWT + identity
4. Partner keys released to Woodgrove TEE memory
